original_text: Ben-Hadad, the king of Syria, was ill in Damascus. Elisha went to Damascus at that time. Somebody told the king, ‘The man of God has come to the city.’
korean_text: 엘리사가 다메섹에 갔을 때에 아람 왕 벤하닷이 병들었더니 왕에게 들리기를 이르되 하나님의 사람이 여기 이르렀나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: Ben-Hadad, the king of Syria, was ill in Damascus.
sentences.korean_translation: 아람의 왕 벤하닷이 다메섹에서 병이 들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Elisha went to Damascus at that time.
The man of God has come to the city.
